post.body: That was fast, Dad!
You know I don't do no'th this time of year! The entire family is meeting in Miami for a wedding. :)
I suppose that happened when I had to drive the hour west to catch a plane going east. <shrug>
Does that at least give you a day off?
Going to enroll you and @Cra1g in a deWooting program - get a 2fer1 deal.
I'm a huge fan in general.
Just the Thursday night games.
Our biggest battle is actually our pseudo IT dept at the central office - they tie our hands at every turn.
I would have voted for Nathan. He turned out to be a good guy - not at all like his recently departed father.
I use paint.net - never had any luck with the GIMP. And I give them all cd's with a copy of OpenOffice.
Can't wait to see what you wind up with!
What'd they think?
Yes, we must now go Hero-less until after the Superbowl!
No, they really need a Palm desktop clone.
I guess we're full circle where Nathan is a bad guy again.
I think we'll have lots of deaths tonight.
Well Kyle didn't last long once he finally got his powers.
Syler has become a most intriguing character.
Just because they're simple doesn't mean they're NOT profound.
Do Not Disturb looks like a great find!
We don't have a Miami branch - that's where the bride's father lives. It's our whole family that's great. :)
Wow - that sounds pretty cool!
But doing what? You would quit your current job for it? Move?
What would that mean?
Go baby! We sure missed you in Miami, but acccording to your father we are 2nd half-cousins - & then there's David and Sydney.
Shoot...you had to narrow the scope of the shame you don't have? ;)
The wedding was great. The groom's side reunion afterwards was even better. We have THE BEST family!
MS might open up more personal (non business) users without the need for Outlook with WM. How hard can it be?
A 6 day old response has to be some kind of record.
Merry Christmas and g'night!
Can't complain about getting paid double time! Not something that happens in my life.
I'm working...just not outside of the house for someone else.
Thanks Ryan. Don't bother with the forum yet...I'll probably switch it to SMF tomorrow.
Thanks Phil!
Happy Christmas, Chris! Enjoy this special time with family.
Looks like you're gonna be right behind @dmcduck on the road out.
Enjoy your free time!
Definitely disturbing! Did you read those reviews? Hahahahaha!!!
Actually, the whole idea is a bit disturbing!
I'd have gone with french fry.
Great to hear! We were just talking about you yesterday. ;)
Welcome! Didn't even know y'all had a presence on Twitter.
Yea, the hidden backpack straps are way cool. I hope you like it!
Definitely something to woot about!
A sure sign. ;)
Evidently you left something undone.
420 DM's...I wonder if there's a hidden meaning in there?
Did I also mention that I'm flying first class all the way to Ft. Lauderdale? Wound up cheaper than coach. But coach all the way back.
It just gets better and better. Gulfport also has free public WiFi!
Glfport airport is twice as big as Mobile - it has an Arbys! I'm splurging early. :-)
Damn Chicago. But it was a good game - worth staying up late for!
I can't believe the Saints and Bears are going into Overtime.
The Saints are keeping me up past my bedtime tonight!
Have I mentioned lately how much I despise da Bears?
Atlanta to Gulfport on a MD88 and 30 passengers. Sweeeeet!
Sitting n the gound in Atlanta. Theres a plane at our gate & it won't eave so we can get off!
First transformation of http://justanothergeeksite.com is done. More to come!
RT @WorldMate: you are now eligible for up to a $100 rebate when you book a hotel on WorldMate Live: @BlackBerryCool http://tinyurl.com/ ...
twittercounter.com - pretty cool!
